about.title: About Me
about.text: As a seasoned Creative Director, I excel in crafting innovative solutions that transform concepts into captivating visual models, designed to exceed client expectations. My portfolio showcases over half a decade of expertise in visual direction, design, and video editing.

video.title: Video Editing Portfolio
video.desc: A portfolio in the field of video editing, motion graphics, and reel production.

privileges.title: Privileges
privileges.highQuality: High Quality: Creating visuals according to academic standards.
privileges.speed: Speed in Performance: We can speed up work by 40%.
privileges.packages: Multiple Packages in Terms of Cost: Suitable for small and emerging companies.
privileges.postService: Post Delivery Service: We provide post-delivery support to ensure success.

one.text: “I collaborated with Mr. Sami Zakaria at EGYAUTO and his excellence exceeded expectations.”
one.author: - Shadi Trabulsi, CEO at EGYAUTO
